item.title: Turning Off Syntax Highlighting
item.description: Few weeks back I stumbled on this blog post which stated the obvious benefits of disabling syntax highlighting for your code. I would have been surprised if I hadn't read this one before. Both the blog posts advocate disabling colors schemes completely or minimally. At the outset this seems absurd for anyone who has been coding for any length of time and insane for the cool kids who started learning to code in the age of color monitors.
